postData.contentHtml:
sudo apt-get install gconf-editor

1.Open gconf-editor in Terminal2.Choose desktop -> ibus -> general -> hotkey.3.Open trigger parameter.4.Remove Ctrl+Space key combination from the list and press OK.

Thank You, Anton Danshinhttp://jetcracker.wordpress.com/2012/05/01/ctrl-space-doesnt-work-ubuntu/
postData.title: Fix Ctrl+Space doesn’t work  in Eclipse And Netbean Ubuntu 12.04
